ISSUE.TITLE: The item count DashBoards View displayed per page is not correct
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary The item count DashBoards view displayed per page is not correct. By default, 20/page, but it actually shows only 12 items. If I switch to 5/page, it only shows 2 items. It can be reproduced on the deploy preview. https://redash-preview.netlify.app/dashboards?order=name&page=1&page_size=5 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8188177/114211400-2c746580-9993-11eb-87a4-b5da5e3aabfc.png) ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 9.0.0-beta (67263e1b) * Browser/OS: Chrome 89.0.4389.114 * How did you install Redash: Docker

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: Duplicate dashboard rows were returned by Dashboard.all() (#5466)
Fix: pagination is broken on the dashboard list page (#5516) * Add test that reproduces issue #5466 * Fix: Duplicate dashboard rows were returned by Dashboard.all() (#5466)
Fix: pagination is broken on the dashboard list page (#5516) * Add test that reproduces issue #5466 * Fix: Duplicate dashboard rows were returned by Dashboard.all() (#5466)
